alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 06 at 4:11AM PST until January 07 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM PST SATURDAY ALONG THE BASE OF THE OREGON BLUE MOUNTAINS... * WHAT...Southeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected along the base of the Blue Mountains. * WHERE...Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Interstate 84 from Mission to Cabbage Hill will be affected by the strong winds. Strong crosswinds are likely along Highway 11 from Pendleton to Milton-Freewater..
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
